attributes.action: Give equal value to England and the English as is given to Scotland and Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is becoming increasingly noticeable that the divide between the social and economic benefits afforded to the Scottish and Welsh peoples is disproportionate to that given to the people of England.
Free school meals, free prescriptions, free eye care, free dental care, significantly better education, and welfare for the old, to name but a few, is far more advanced in Scotland and Wales. Will the Prime Minister address these inconsistencies with immediate effect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
